page.title: 14Keynsham Leisure Centre.
page.content: The Leisure Centre is a huge building. It was built in 1976. It is behind the shops on Temple Street. To get in you have to go down a flight of stairs. The swimming pool is down another flight of stairs almost by the river. The sports hall is used for table tennis, trampolening, badminton and gymnastics. There are courses for everyone and special courses for the Over-50's to keep them fit and healthy. There are also squash courts and dancing classes. The Leisure Centre is open every day (the swimming pool is also open for early morning swimming). Sometimes clubs use the swimming pool and you have to wait until they have finished. There is a bar in the Leisure Centre which overlooks the swimming pool. The snack bar also overlooks the swimming pool but sells mostly fried food!
